entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Monday 13 February 2023
